name: kenya-livability-platform
description: Kenya Infrastructure Livability Platform - Track power, water, and internet reliability

scripts.build: bun run build:client && bun run build:server
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server && bunx prisma migrate dev
scripts.setup: bun run docker:up && bun run prisma:migrate && bun run prisma:seed
scripts.clean: bun run docker:down && rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules
